news.headline: Everyoone Thinks Microsoft Corporation (MSFT) Spent More And Accelerated Its AI Business, Says Jim Cramer
news.summary: We recently published Jim Cramer Said AI Is A “Souped-Up Google” As He Discussed These 11 Stocks. Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. news.headline: Dustin Sedgwick joins Intapp as Chief Marketing Officer
news.summary: PALO ALTO, Calif., August 29, 2025--Intapp (NASDAQ: INTA), a leading global provider of AI-powered solutions for professionals at advisory, capital markets, and legal firms, announces Dustin Sedgwick has joined the company as Chief Marketing Officer.

news.headline: Corrections & Amplifications
news.summary: CORRECTIONS Police arrested three former Microsoft staffers and several other people on Tuesday for protesting at Microsoft’s headquarters. A Page One article on Thursday about protests at tech companies incorrectly said four former Microsoft staffers were among those arrested.

news.headline: Wall Street’s Momentum Train Hits Full Speed Into September
news.summary: Markets barely flinched this week — despite fresh political pressure on the Federal Reserve and tepid Nvidia Corp. revenue guidance — until a tech-led pullback Friday, amid thin trading.  Risk appetite continues to spill into nearly every corner of markets, from corporate bonds and cryptocurrencies

news.headline: Bill Gates Told NBA's Steph Curry How He'd Answer 'What's Your Salary Expectation?' in a Job Interview — 'I Prefer Stock Options More Than Cash'
news.summary: Job interviews aren't usually fun—unless you're Bill Gates and Steph Curry's the one asking the questions. Back in 2020, with the world mid-pandemic and Zoom calls the norm, the NBA superstar sat down virtually with the Microsoft co-founder for an episode of his YouTube series "State of Inspiration.
